isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Rocker Arm Assembly, Camshaft Assembly, Tappets, and Push Rods - Install - Tappets

svcproc.title: Tappets
svcproc.para: If roller tappets are reusable, lubricate roller tappets and guides with clean engine oil. Install in their original bores. If new tappets are used, install new tappets.

caution.para: To prevent possible engine damage, do not install new style valve train components in engines produced with old style valve train components. Replacement of old style valve train components requires complete replacement of all valve train components, including push rod assemblies, roller tappet assemblies, and rocker arm assemblies.

note.para: Make sure reused tappet rollers are all turned in same direction as when removed.
